Package org.luisa.miniwrangler.java.transform

Interface ITextTransformBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITextTransformConcatBuilder, ITextTransformFixedValueBuilder, ITextTransformRenameBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextTransformConcat.Builder, TextTransformFixedValue.Builder, TextTransformRename.Builder
    public interface ITextTransformBuilder
    An interface for building ITexTransform type instances
    Author:
    Luisa Pinto
